EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Registration Regulations

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 73(1)a of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Actb, hereby makes the annexed Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Registration Regulations.

Section.Text: The following definitions apply in these Regulations.

Definition.Text: Act means the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act. (Loi)
financial entity has the same meaning as in subsection 1(2) of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations. (entité financière)
foreign money services business means a person or entity referred to in paragraph 5(h.1) of the Act. (entreprise de services monétaires étrangère)
money services business means a person or entity referred to in paragraph 5(h) of the Act. (entreprise de services monétaires)

Section.Text: For the purposes of subsection 54.1(3) of the Act, identifying information means the information set out in Parts A and C of Schedule 1 and the dates when a person’s or entity’s registration is revoked or expires and when a registered person or entity ceases an activity.

Heading.TitleText: Prescribed Entities Not Eligible for Registration

Subsection.Text: A corporation is not eligible for registration with the Centre if its chief executive officer, its president or one of its directors or a person or entity that owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of the shares of the corporation is referred to in any of paragraphs 11.11(1)(a) to (d), (e.1) and (f) of the Act.

An entity that is not a corporation is not eligible for registration with the Centre if its chief executive officer, its president or one of its directors or a person or entity that owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of the entity is referred to in any of paragraphs 11.11(1)(a) to (d), (e.1) and (f) of the Act.

Heading.TitleText: Applications, Notifications, Clarifications and Supplementary Information

Section.Text: An applicant or a registered person or entity must submit the following information to the Centre, in accordance with guidelines that are prepared by the Centre, electronically if they have the technical capability to do so or by telephone if they do not:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the information contained in an application for registration referred to in section 11.12 of the Act;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a notification, referred to in section 11.13 of the Act, of a change to the information contained in an application or of newly obtained information;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a clarification requested by the Centre under section 11.14 or 11.17 of the Act;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: the information contained in an application for the renewal of registration referred to in section 11.19 of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: a notification of the cessation of an activity referred to in section 11.2 of the Act.

Section.Text: An application referred to in paragraph 4(a) or (e), a notification referred to in paragraph 4(b) and a clarification referred to in paragraph 4(d) must contain the information set out in Schedule 1.
A notification referred to in paragraph 4(f) must contain the information set out in Schedule 2.
For greater certainty, although items in Schedules 1 and 2 are described in the singular, a person or entity must report all known information that falls within an item.

For the purposes of section 11.19 of the Act, when a person or entity that is referred to in paragraph 5(h) of the Act and that is engaged in the business of providing the service referred to in subparagraph 5(h)(iv) of the Act, or a person or entity that is referred to in paragraph 5(h.1) of the Act, renews their registration for the first time, they must do so no later than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in the case of a person, the last day of the month of the person’s first birthday that occurs after the second anniversary of their initial registration;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in the case of a corporation, the last day of the month of the first anniversary of its incorporation that occurs after the second anniversary of its initial registration; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in the case of an entity other than a corporation, the day after the second anniversary of its initial registration.

ScheduleFormHeading.Label: SCHEDULE 1
ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Information To Be Included in Application for Registration or Renewal of Registration, Notification of Changes to Information in Existing Application, Notification of Newly Obtained Information and Clarification of Information in Existing Application

Heading.Label: PART A
Heading.TitleText: Identifying Information with Respect to Applicant

Provision.Text: Applicant’s name and operating name
Status of applicant (whether sole proprietorship, partnership, corporation or other)
In the case of an entity, its registration or incorporation number, jurisdiction and country of issue of that number and date on which number was issued
Address of place of business
Applicant’s telephone number
Applicant’s URL

Every service referred to in paragraph 5(h) or (h.1) of the Act, or every activity referred to in paragraph 5(l) of the Act, in respect of which applicant is applying to be registered or to have registration renewed

Existing registration number issued to applicant by the Centre (in the case of an application for renewal of registration, notification of changes to information in existing application or of newly obtained information or clarification of information in existing application)

Type of information submitted (information contained in application for registration or renewal of registration, notification of changes to information in existing application or of newly obtained information or clarification of information in existing application)
Date of submission of application, notification or clarification
Mailing address of place of business (if different from address in item 5 of Part A)
Applicant’s email address
If applicant is a person, their name, date of birth and country and political subdivision or territory of birth and of residence
If applicant is a corporation

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: name, date of birth and country and political subdivision or territory of birth and of residence of its chief executive officer, its president, each of its directors and every person who owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of its shares

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: name, incorporation number and jurisdiction and country of incorporation of every corporation that owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of its shares

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: name, registration number and jurisdiction and country of registration of every entity other than a corporation that owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of its shares
If applicant is an entity other than a corporation

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: name, date of birth and country and political subdivision or territory of birth and of residence of its chief executive officer, its president, each of its directors and every person who owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of entity

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: name, incorporation number and jurisdiction and country of incorporation of every corporation that owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of entity

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: name, registration number and jurisdiction and country of registration of every entity other than a corporation that owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of entity
If applicant is a foreign money services business,

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: telephone number and email address of person who resides in Canada and who is authorized to accept, on applicant’s behalf, notices that are served or caused to be served by the Centre under the Act

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: if document that sets out applicant’s record of criminal convictions — or, if applicant is an entity, record of criminal convictions of applicant’s chief executive officer, president and directors and persons who own or control, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of entity or shares of entity — or that states that applicant or those persons do not have record is made in language other than English or French,

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: country, political subdivision or territory and city from which document originated

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: language in which document made

Provision.Label: (iii)
Provision.Text: name of provincial organization in Canada that issued translator’s certification and name of translator

Name, address, account number and branch number or transit number of every financial entity, and every entity outside Canada that provides financial services, with which applicant maintains account for purposes of providing services referred to in paragraph 5(h) or (h.1) of the Act

Name and address of every money services business and foreign money services business used by applicant to conduct transactions and registration number issued to that money services business or foreign money services business by the Centre

Name, address, telephone number and email address of person referred to in paragraph 156(1)(a) of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations who is responsible for implementation of compliance program
Language in which records of applicant are kept under the Act
Indication as to whether service referred to in item 8 of Part A is provided, or activity referred to in that item is carried out, in a dwelling-house
Number of persons employed by applicant for purposes of services or activities referred to in item 8 of Part A (at time of application for registration or renewal of registration)

Approximate annual value in Canadian dollars of all foreign exchange transactions and all other services or activities referred to in item 8 of Part A (at time of application for registration or renewal of registration)
Name, address, telephone number, email address and title of person submitting application on applicant’s behalf
Indication of whether applicant has previously submitted application for registration

Heading.Label: PART C
Heading.TitleText: Information with Respect to Applicant’s Agents or Mandataries and Branches

Provision.Text: Name and operating name of every agent or mandatary
Address and telephone number of every agent or mandatary and branch
Every service or activity referred to in item 8 of Part A that is provided or carried out by agent or mandatary or branch
Relationship to applicant (whether agent or mandatary or branch)

ScheduleFormHeading.Label: SCHEDULE 2
ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Cessation of Activity by Registered Person or Entity

Provision.Text: Name and operating name of registered person or entity
Existing registration number of registered person or entity
Date of submission of notification of cessation of activity
Proposed effective date of cessation of activity
Name, address, telephone number, email address and title of person submitting notification of cessation of activity on behalf of registered person or entity
